title: Service form element of the ACRIS data model
description:
The Service Form Element encloses any number of actual booking elements (Service Elements) that
should be displayed in a semantic context. It allows adding descriptive information to the collection of Ser-
vice Elements

id.description: Property. Unique ID of the object

type.description: Property. It has to be ServiceFormElement

title.description: Property. Title of the form element

serviceElements.description: Relationship. List of booking elements See section 3.4.4 of the original document  https://acris.aero/publicdownloads/file/19/

waterquality.description: Property. the description of a water quality
